p:
In 1727, a year of low‐level endemic and epidemic influenza in Europe, an apparently new phenomenon was documented: an extremely explosive equine epizootic that far overshadowed the associated epidemic. Large scale European equine epizootics or panzootics recurred in 1750 and 1760.
